solution_line_template: Harrison read {harrison_more_than_assigned} more than the assigned {assigned_pages} pages so he read {harrison_more_than_assigned}+{assigned_pages} = <<{harrison_more_than_assigned}+{assigned_pages}={harrison_pages}>>{harrison_pages} pages

Pam read {pam_more_than_harrison} more pages than Harrison's {harrison_pages} pages so she read {pam_more_than_harrison}+{harrison_pages} = <<{pam_more_than_harrison}+{harrison_pages}={pam_pages}>>{pam_pages} pages
Sam read twice the amount of Pam's {pam_pages} pages so he read {sam_multiplier}*{pam_pages} = <<{pam_pages}*{sam_multiplier}={sam_pages}>>{sam_pages} pages
